metadata.Title: CVE-2020-7923 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A user authorized to perform database queries may cause denial of serviceby issuing specially crafted queries, which violate an invariant in thequery subsystem's support for geoNear. This issue affects: MongoDB Inc.MongoDB Server v4.4 versions prior to 4.4.0-rc7; v4.2 versions prior to4.2.8; v4.0 versions prior to 4.0.19.

criterions.comment: mongodb package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
